AD_SharranSoftStepPlaque_02.synopsis: A Sharran plaque at the end of Soft step trial

AD_SharranSoftStepPlaque_03.synopsis: A Sharran plaque at the end of Soft step trial

AD_SharranSoftStepPlaque_Broken_01.synopsis: A Sharran plaque at the end of Soft step trial broken in desperation or crumbled because of time

AD_SharFacedPillar_01.synopsis: A pillar with Shar's face and a bit runic figures-drawings. Iti s placed in the final room of Soft step trial where player picks up his reward

AD_SharranSoftStepPlaque_01.synopsis: A Sharran plaque at the end of Soft step trial

AD_SharranSoftStepPlaque_02_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_SharranSoftStepPlaque_02_0.text: *To be unseen is to be welcomed everywhere.*

AD_SharranSoftStepPlaque_03_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_SharranSoftStepPlaque_03_0.text: *Seek no permission - take all that benefits you.*

AD_SharranSoftStepPlaque_Broken_01_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_SharranSoftStepPlaque_Broken_01_0.text: *A plaque that once bore the teachings of Lady Shar - but now unreadable.*

AD_SharranSoftStepPlaque_01_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_SharranSoftStepPlaque_01_0.text: *A soft step is better than any armour.*
